name: Survive in Hyperdrive
description:
Is your body ready?

Survive in Hyperdrive in an intense fast paced challenging game. The speed of the spaceship has malfunctioned which has caused you to become stuck in hyperdrive. Follow the directions that appear on the screen before they hit your spaceship. Your ship has four health points, but if an alert hits your spaceship or if you enter the incorrect prompt your ship will lose a health point. How long can you survive? Have fun!

• Quick in & out arcade game
• Simple controls with fast challenging gameplay
• Sharp bold graphics with neon accents
• Game Circle leaderboard
